posts.post_title: Will a Seymour Throwing be found with SC350#25 back?
posts.post_content:
Jamie,

Seymour Throwing with an SC 350 fact 25 back has not been confirmed.  If you do find one, please let me know so I can add it to the confirmed list.

Best Regards and Happy Collecting!

Craig

I have 1... Im going for a double back set which is why i need the second.. heres a pic of my first one..
